trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of instances of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> class supported by the XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<binding>` element enclosed by the root `<definitions>` element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> to add to the collection.
The zero-based index where the binding parameter has been added.

Returns a value indicating whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> is a member of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> for which to check collection membership.
`true` if the binding parameter is a member of the ; otherwise, `false`.

Copies the entire <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref>, starting at the specified zero-based index of the target array.
An array of type <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> serving as the destination for the copy action.
The zero-based index at which to start placing the copied collection.
Searches for the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> for which to search in the collection.
A 32-bit signed integer.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection"></xref> at the specified zero-based index.
If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `binding` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection>.
The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
The zero-based index at which to insert the binding parameter.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> to be added to the collection.
Gets or sets the value of a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> at the specified zero-based index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> whose value is modified or returned.
A `Binding`.
The index parameter is less than zero.
\- or -
The index parameter is greater than .
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> specified by its name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> returned.
A `Binding`.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection"></xref>.
This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
The elements that follow the removed `Binding` move up to occupy the vacated spot.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> to remove from the collection.
